name: dawn-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a male kirlia into gallade or a female snorunt into froslass.
short_effect: Evolves a male Kirlia into Gallade or a female Snorunt into Froslass.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
